unknown.description: This skill does not have a description.

overall.description: This level helps improve your overall skill level.

cube.description: This level contains significant Cube gameplay.

ship.description: This level contains significant Ship gameplay.

ball.description: This level contains significant Ball gameplay.

ufo.description: This level contains significant UFO gameplay.

wave.description: This level contains significant Wave gameplay.

robot.description: This level contains significant Robot gameplay.

spider.description: This level contains significant Spider gameplay.

swing.description: This level contains significant Swing gameplay.

swing-legacy.description: This level contains significant Swingcopter gameplay. This involves the Dual Ball setup using Blue Orbs as opposed to the 2.2 Swing gamemode.

duals.description: This level contains significant Dual parts.

speed-changes.description: This level contains lots of Speed Changes.

nerve-control.description: This level helps with improving nerve control, due to its length. Don't choke!

memory.description: This level has a lot of Memory sections in it. Remember to FOCUS.

fast-paced.description: This level goes very, very fast. Remember to Practice!

gm-changes.description: This level tends to switch Gamemodes fast and often.

timings.description: This level helps you improve your overall Timing. Keep it up and you'll reach your Final Destination.

learny.description: This level requires a bit more effort to learn. Keep practicing and you'll get it soon!

flow.description: This level helps you improve on Flow gameplay.

moving-gp.description: This level contains some Moving Gameplay. You may have to memorize the patterns.

high-cps.description: This level contains sections that require High CPS (Clicks Per Second).

2p.description: This level has 2 Player Mode enabled for Dual sections.

chokepoints.description: This level may have places where you can commonly mess up. Practice these sections throughly!

awkward.description: This level has some unconventional or awkward gameplay in it.

sp-best-level.description: TrusTa gave "hell and heaven" this award.

sp-boogie.description: This level is very, very long.

sp-jedwint.description: This level was chosen for the Twelve Demons of Christmas by Jedwint.
